Title: Celebrating a bumper harvest
Publisher: Hebei renmin chubanshe (河北人民出版社)
Notes: Various slogans are shown in this poster, including "Agriculture must study Dazhai" (农业学大寨), "We must regulate the Haihe River" (一定要根治海河), and "Take steel as the key link for all-out development" (以钢为纲全面发展). The Haihe River is near Tianjin.
